about_the_game:
Unlock 4 hats by finishing the challenges added in this DLC and get 15.000 gold to buy your first skin variations.

Unlockable-Hats-Content
Haybale: Survive an Invasion on peasant difficulty without dying
Flowerpot: Survive an Invasion on citizen difficulty without dying
Little Companion: Survive an Invasion on knight difficulty without dying
Crown: Survive an Invasion on king difficulty without dying
15.000 Gold

Note: This DLC is not refundable because of the consumable Gold and the cosmetics (Hats) need to be unlocked by finishing the quest asociated with the cosmetic item.
